articles.content: The market had a lacklustre week ended November 24 due to the absence of any major global and domestic cues, yet ended higher for the fourth consecutive week. The coming truncated week (Monday being … [+9217 chars]

articles.title: Govt announces mandatory biogas blending in CNG, PNG - The New Indian Express
articles.description: Petroleum minister Hardeep Singh Puri while talking about the initiative said the CBG blending obligation will promote production and consumption of CBG in the country.
